paper.title: Factors related to risk tolerance: A further examination
paper.abstract: This paper reports the findings from regression models that were developed to predict financial risk tolerance using demographic and socioeconomic factors. Using a sample of white-collar clerical workers (N = 220), it was determined that financial knowledge, income, education, ethnic background, financial solvency, number of dependents, and homeownership can be used to predict a person's financial risk tolerance.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是个人财务风险容忍度的预测模型，虽然涉及金融风险的概念，但并不直接应用于衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等特定金融研究领域。
